meanings.sent1: The farmer worked hard on his farmland every day.
meanings.sent2: The cows grazed peacefully on the vast farmland.
meanings.sent3: Why did the scarecrow refuse to work on the farmland? Because he was outstanding in his field!
meanings.sent4: The farmland was a patchwork quilt of green and brown, like nature's own artwork.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunset bathed the farmland in a warm, glowing light, creating a picturesque scene.

meanings.sent2: The government provided subsidies to help farmers purchase quality farmland.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato turn red on the farmland? Because it saw the salad dressing!
